I read an article linked from reddit last year that argued that its unlikely life develops as you get closer to the center of the galaxy. Stuff is closer together there so much higher chance of asteroids, solar flares, supernovas, whatever. This means we should rule out the vast majority of stars in the milky way and focus on stars at the edge. First off we cant see stars on the other side of the galaxy because the core is too bright.
There is more to it than earthlike.
1. Goldilocks zone.
2. Really small stars like trappist are unlikely. The earthlike worlds in the goldilocks zone close to the star so more at risk to solar flares.
3. Planet needs a big metallic core that can create a magnetic field to block deadly radiation.
4. Large jupiter like planet whose gravity pulls asteroids to it and reduces the chance of asteroids hitting the planet.
5. Seismically active might be a big help to life
6. Quiet part of the galaxy with little other activity that could kill off life. This eliminates the core and most solar systems in the galaxy

Its less the vastness of space and more ho hard it us to get into space due to gravity. If intelligent life evolved on a world woth less gravity they would have an advantage for getting into space. However, i dont know if less gravity means less fossil fuels would be created due to less pressure.

The heat death of the universe. The universe is expanding faster and faster. Eventually all galaxies outside of our local group will be moving away from us faster than the speed of light. This means in the future the visible universe will be much smaller. Eventually all the hydrogen will be used up and all stars will die. The last remaining power source in the far dark future will be black holes. They will eventually evaporate. All matter will break down into component parts. The universe will go dark for an inifinite period of time.
There is no hope.

WRITING.TITLE: Do charms get better?
WRITING.TEXT:
Im in ng+. On my 3rd meditation. Even elite charm bonuses are so small they dont matter. Even if i stockpile all my precursors. I use them and the bonuses are so small they dont matter.
The value to dungeons are he huge power drop rate. You dont drop down in levels sp power drop rate is much higher. I save most of my power drop and gold runes for dungeons. I frequently recall just before the boss repeatedly due to the big power drop bonuses. I stockpile keys for periods when my powerdrop gain slows down.
2 keys when you are at the last before ng+ is great. Used them and when i got back 45 minutes later my power was 100x higher and i cruised past him.

I think runes stack additively. If you see a separate rune nd not one piled on top of another they stack additively. If you use the same rune several times you will see a stack. This means they run consecutively.
There are 3 spell runes that raise xp bonus. Id use all three then the bonus i occassionally get xp bonus charms that are up to 10%. Some for one color spell. I dont know if those are additive or multiplicative wirh runes. You can check by looking in the notebook and seeing how much it goes up.
For z runes. I would wait for new game+. This doubles spell xp and higher marks need alot more xp. Train the runes you have to have their spell xp passive at the existing mark. Wait for late in the eun when you have several levels of the skill that trains all runes. They do 5% per level and does not reset wirh meditation(but resets with ng+).
Id also spend stones on the bonus that cuts xp training in half before using. Get alot together to use.

WRITING.TITLE: Are static leap and conduit useless?
WRITING.TEXT:
Static leap you jump backwards. This just slows your run down. I asked what blink does and that leaps you backward. I was told it doesnt do anything.
Conduit is supposed to enhance other lightning spells, i tested it with 4 lightning spells and had conduit at 1.5, my kill rate does not seem to go up.
What do you think?

Tip i like in wilds or raids. Equip runes that make do summons. Add cooldown increases. Get a stack of runes that also do summons. After you get 2 summons casting, use your stack stack of summons.
Then have a stack of runes that increase how long they stay. 30 second ones are best. Switch off summoning runes to other stuff for offense since you have butt load of perma summons. Use mage celeration, have heal and immunity, use xp bonuses here too. You will fly up zones. P Dont use in dingeons. You lose all summons each room.

You get power much faster in dungeons than in wilds. Keep repeating and let your mage power go up. I frequently cant get past the first room of a dungeon. Those are the best. Ill end up getting the most mage power. In wilds when you restart, you have to run through zones that get you very little power and gold. Dungeons are more efficient. Ill even make it to the end of a dungeon and recall before finishing several times to get more power.
I generally dont do this with centaurs in the final room. I have to use too many heals and immunity.
Never leave a dungeon early. Its absolutely worth it even if it take several hours to finish.

If he is smart he will run a conservative as well, but one who would compromise so people in the district dont really have any reason to turn out if you care about him.
